description:
Are you new to scripting? Do you want to take your web development career to the next level? You’re at the right place. This course is for passionate learners who want to learn new languages to boost up their knowledge.

This JavaScript course is a quick crash course that will help you to gain some quality knowledge about what we have in JavaScript in little time. This course perfectly suits on you if you are a complete newbie in the JavaScript. I have structured this course in such a way that you could learn a lot more things in Javascript in few hours. I have explained all the basic concepts and live examples are shown in every video so that you could get concepts easily with no doubt left in your mind.

We will start this course with a quick introduction to Javascript and then will learn about the syntax. After this, we will learn functions, arrays, alerts, prompts, linking, comments, etc.

So what are you waiting for? Enroll now and start learning new things that you don’t know. I see you inside.
title: Javascript : Foundation JavaScript
instructors: Ankit Shrivastava, TweakCoder eLearning Solutions, Siddarth Kumar
